ruleBookInfo.init:
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()); var book = { name: o('h1').replace(/\s.*/,''), author: o('.ml1 ul li:eq(2)').replace(/.*ï¼š/,''), kind: o('.ml1 ul li:eq(0)').replace(/.*ï¼š/,'').replace(/\s-\s/,',') + ',' + o('.ml1 ul li:eq(3)').replace(/.*ï¼š/,''), wordCount: o('.ml1 ul li:eq(1)').replace(/.*ï¼š/,''), latest: o('.ml1 ul li:eq(4)').replace(/æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼š/,''), intro: '
' + J.select('.center p').html(), cover: J.select('.ml1 img').attr('src'), url: J.select('.ml1 dl a:eq(0)').attr('href') +',{charset:"gbk"}', }; book;
ruleBookInfo.name: name
